abstract: Virginia defeats Vanderbilt, 4-2, to win College World Series finals, 2-1, and university's first baseball national title
lead_paragraph: Pavin Smith homered and drove in three runs, leading Virginia over Vanderbilt for the university’s first baseball national championship.

headline.main: College World Series Droughts End for Virginia and the A.C.C.
headline.print_headline: Title Droughts End for Virginia and the A.C.C.

snippet: Pavin Smith homered and drove in three runs, leading Virginia over Vanderbilt for the university’s first baseball national championship.
